not join tighten up the circle and bind off use the two tail ends to attach the ears to the side of the head if you can t do a magic_ring then chain 2 and make 3 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook do not join bind off and use the two tail ends to attach the ears to the side of his head shirt collar 1 chain 16 in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet and half_double_crochet in same stitch skip next chain single_crochet in next 9 stitches skip next chain and half_double_crochet and double_crochet in last stitch bind off attach collar to doll s neck leaving room for the tie in between the two wide ends of your collar piece tie 1 chain 12 single_crochet in 3rd chain from the hook slip_stitch in next 8 chain stitches half_double_crochet in last chain space use 2 tail ends to sew the tie in between the collar you should make sure the last half_double_crochet is facing front and also tack the tie down just below the half_double_crochet so the tie doesn t flop around page 5 of 7
